Method Detail

reset

public void reset(int intBiospecimenKey,
                  neuragenix.security.AuthToken authToken)
Function resets the TransactionManager (simillar to defining a new transaction manager) Function assumes the transactionAction is a save. (Change via call to setTransactionAction()) Function assumes the transaction quantity is 1. (Change via call to setTransactionQuantity())

setTransactionQuantity

public void setTransactionQuantity(double dbQty)
Function allows an external class to specify the quantity involved in the biospecimen transaction update. The default constructur sets this to 1.

setTransactionAction

public void setTransactionAction(boolean isSave)
Function allows an external class to specify if the biospecimen transaction is a save (true) or delete (false) The default constructur sets this to true (ie. a save).

cascadedUpdateTransactions

public void cascadedUpdateTransactions()
Recursive function will update the transaction history for all of its parents If the biospecimen intBiospecimenKey has a parent. Function expects that the provided Map contains key/value pairs for - type of transaction - qty added/removed - amount collected - amount removed - amount remaining
